thread.title: Tamannaah to shake a leg with Ram Charan in his next
thread.title_full: Tamannaah to shake a leg with Ram Charan in his next - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Tamannaah to shake a leg with Ram Charan in his next
text: Tamannaah has reportedly got an opportunity to dance to a special song in actor Ram Charan's upcoming "Bruce Lee", which also features Chiranjeevi in a cameo. "Tamannaah has been offered the song that was originally planned with Ileana (D'Cruz). While Tamannaah is yet to sign the dotted line, it is learnt that she has given her nod," a source from the film's unit told. Chiranjeevi will also shake a leg in this song along with his son. The makers plan to shoot the song next week in Hyderabad. Directed by Srinu Vaitla, "Bruce Lee" also features Rakul Preet Singh, Kriti Kharbanda, Brahmanandam, Nadiya, Tisca Chopra and Arun Vijay in important roles. In the film, Chiranjeevi will also share the screen space with his son in a fight sequence. Produced by D.V.V Danayya, the film is slated to hit the screens on October 16.
